references.paper_title: Microsoft coco: Common objects in context
references.reason: This paper introduces the COCO dataset, a widely used benchmark for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, making it a cornerstone for evaluating new methods.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper presents ResNet, a revolutionary architecture that addresses the vanishing gradient problem and enables training of very deep neural networks, which is heavily used in the field.

Introduces the Squeeze-and-Excitation (SE) block, a fundamental attention mechanism that adaptively recalibrates channel-wise feature responses and has become a common component in many CNN architectures.

references.paper_title: Swin transformer: Hierarchical vision transformer using shifted windows
references.reason: Introduces the Swin Transformer, a hierarchical vision transformer that brings transformer-based models to various vision tasks and set the new state-of-the-art, as well as provides an alternative approach to CNNs.

references.paper_title: Condconv: Conditionally parameterized convolutions for efficient inference
references.reason: Introduces CondConv, a dynamic convolution approach where filters are conditionally parameterized and combined based on input, improving efficiency and adaptability, which is critical to the proposed work.
